scenario_text.value: Huh? I think I see Lopmon and Shuuji.
Shuuji, what’s going on?
Hello, Takuma.

I’m feeling better after resting,
so I’m investigating the area with Lopmon.

The longer we work together, the more I can
feel how strong my partner really is.
That’s great to hear, Shuuji.
Indeed.

I can’t believe you had that kind of power
all along. I genuinely had no idea.
But it’s not really my power.

Your thoughts and desire to protect
everyone... I think that’s what changed me.
So, thank you, Shuuji.
No way. I should be thanking you, Lopmon.
You helped me realize just how wrong I was.

I had no real strength. All I did was push
other people around because I was older.

I didn’t take responsibility when I needed to
and do what needed to be done myself.

When things didn’t go well because of that,
I blamed other people for it.

And to be honest, deep down, I really hated
myself.
Shuuji, I’m so sorry...

No, it’s okay. Because from now on, I want to
be someone who can be more responsible.

Someone who can be a real leader, instead of
just pushing people around.

(Shuuji looks really different.
More clear-headed, like he’s refreshed.)

(I’m glad he’s more focused now, but
I don’t want him to take on too much.)

(I have to give him the support he needs
to make sure that doesn’t happen again.)
(What should I say to Shuuji?)
You look better now.
Don’t go too hard.
We’ll help you.

You look much better now. You seem refreshed,
like you released your demons.

Basically. My anxieties are gone,
and I feel like a new person altogether.

Of course, I’m not forgetting about the
mistakes I’ve made.

I recognize those mistakes, and will make
sure to overcome them as I move forward.

Because that is what it means to take
responsibility for oneself.

But don’t push yourself too hard or things
could get out of hand again...
Haha, way to rub it in.
S-sorry! I didn’t mean to be...

No, I understand.
It’s quite alright.

I’m the one who made a mistake.
I can’t undo it.

So I will reflect on my past and endeavor
to put it to use in the future!

I’ll do anything I can to help.
You can count on us.

Thank you, Takuma.
You’re very dependable.

I was narrow-minded before. I didn’t even
recognize what reliable allies I had.

I’ll do my best for you,
and for everyone!

That’s really good! And you can be sure I’ll
be there to do everything I can to help!

Thanks, Lopmon. I really appreciate your
support. I’ll definitely need it.
No problem! I’m just happy I can help!

(I’m glad the two of them are getting along
better now.)

(It’d be nice if everyone got along
so well...)
